H0.text: What was the codename for the German invasion of Russia in 1941. Operation Nordlicht

H3.text: What was the codename for the German invasion of Russia in 1941. BARBAROSSA

A4.text: The operation, code-named after the Holy Roman Emperor Frederick Barbarossa

A5.text: Hitler had the name changed to Operation Barbarossa in December 1940
